missing_indexes.reason: Optimize active user queries by organization and role
Optimize deal filtering by organization and status
Optimize deal reporting and analytics queries
Optimize client queries by organization and creator

recommendations.title: Add composite index to authentication_user
recommendations.description: Optimize active user queries by organization and role
recommendations.implementation: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_authentication_user_organization_id_is_active_role_id ON authentication_user (organization_id, is_active, role_id)
recommendations.expected_benefit: Improved query performance for organization-scoped operations

recommendations.title: Add composite index to deals_deal
recommendations.description: Optimize deal filtering by organization and status
recommendations.implementation: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_deals_deal_organization_id_verification_status_payment_status ON deals_deal (organization_id, verification_status, payment_status)
recommendations.expected_benefit: Improved query performance for organization-scoped operations

recommendations.title: Add composite index to deals_deal
recommendations.description: Optimize deal reporting and analytics queries
recommendations.implementation: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_deals_deal_organization_id_created_at_deal_value ON deals_deal (organization_id, created_at, deal_value)
recommendations.expected_benefit: Improved query performance for organization-scoped operations

recommendations.title: Add composite index to clients_client
recommendations.description: Optimize client queries by organization and creator
recommendations.implementation: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY idx_clients_client_organization_id_created_by_id ON clients_client (organization_id, created_by_id)
recommendations.expected_benefit: Improved query performance for organization-scoped operations

recommendations.title: Implement query result caching
recommendations.implementation: Use Redis/Memcached for caching organization statistics
recommendations.expected_benefit: Reduced database load and faster response times

recommendations.title: Set up database performance monitoring
recommendations.description: Monitor slow queries and database performance
recommendations.implementation: Enable pg_stat_statements and set up monitoring dashboards
